name: Lumen Technologies, Inc.
description: Lumen Technologies, Inc. is a global technology company that provides a range of communication and data services to businesses and consumers. Formerly known as CenturyLink, Lumen has transformed its business model to focus on delivering cutting-edge solutions in the areas of cloud, security, and connectivity. The company operates an extensive fiber network and offers a suite of services, including high-speed internet, voice, data, and managed services. Lumen is dedicated to helping its customers leverage technology to drive digital transformation and enhance their operational efficiencies. With a strong commitment to innovation, Lumen aims to enable businesses to thrive in the digital age by providing the infrastructure and services necessary for success. The company is positioned to support the growing demand for reliable and secure connectivity, particularly as organizations increasingly migrate to cloud-based solutions. Lumen's vision centers on creating a connected, intelligent world where businesses can seamlessly integrate digital capabilities into their operations. By focusing on customer needs and investing in next-generation technologies, Lumen is committed to delivering exceptional value and service.

seo.meta_title: Lumen Technologies, Inc. | Connectivity and Cloud Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Lumen Technologies, Inc., a leader in connectivity and cloud solutions. Discover how Lumen empowers businesses with innovative technology.

faq.question: What services does Lumen provide?
faq.answer: Lumen provides connectivity, cloud, and managed security services to businesses and consumers.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Lumen?
faq.answer: Jeff Storey is the CEO of Lumen Technologies, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Lumen headquartered?
faq.answer: Lumen is headquartered in Monroe, Louisiana, USA.
